title: Start
body:
<<detachFrom Renata Mia>>
<<moveToX Renata CrackInFloor -20 40>>
<<moveToY Renata CrackInFloor 0 40>>
Renata: Look at this crack in the ground!
<<moveToX Renata CrackInFloor -10 10>>
Mia-miaangryface: Renata! Stay away!
Renata: Maybe we could get into the ruins that way!
Mia-miaannoyedface: Why? Roundier Haia couldn't have fit into the ruins that way!
Renata: Good point.
Mia-miaannoyedface: Let's go home, Nata.
Renata: ....ok.
<<moveLeft Renata 1 10>>
<<showLayer weakspot>>
<<moveDown Renata 10 120>>
<<moveDown Mia 10 120>>
<<hide Mia>>
<<hide Renata>>
<<toMap ruinsescaperoom 1>>
[[end]]
